text:
I just downloaded Tomcat 5.0.18, tried to compile the included package
jsvc.tar.gz and found out it was a bugged release (just a ';' missing in a
source file)
I'm sending here this bug report because I noticed JSVC project already fixed
that, and Tomcat distribution could be fixed just by including a more recent
version of JSVC in the package. (Sorry for my bad english)
creator: xiaoma@libero.it

text:
Indeed, sorry for the trouble. So add the missing ';'.
This has been fixed already in commons-daemon. New TC releases (almost) always
include updated dependencies, so please don't file a bug.
creator: remm@apache.org
